resources.string: Number of Binoculars left to find =

THIS GAME IS JUST LIKE MINESWEEPER BUT IN THIS GAME YOU HAVE TO HELP BATMAN FIND HIS BINOCULARS.ON THE BOARDS YOU HAVE TO PRESS THE BUTTONS AND FIND THE BINOCULARS.WHEN YOU PRESS A BUTTON ON THE BOARD AND IT SHOWS A BINOCULAR GREAT, BUT IF IT DOES NOT SHOW A BINOCULAR THEN IT WILL TRIGGER THE SCAN TO FIND HOW MANY BINOCULARS ARE THERE IN THAT ROW OR COLUMN. YOU CAN ALSO CLICK ON A FOUND BINOCULAR TO TRIGGER A SCAN OF ITS ROWS AND COLUMNS TO FIND THE OTHER BINOCULARS
Written by Supreet Singh Dhillon and Chetan Khosla. This game has been written for CMPT276 -https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/bfraser/grav-cms/cmpt276/course-info

For this Assignment, I have taken help from Dr. Brian Fraserâ€™s YouTube videos.
